text.__SUMMARY__:
Shorea rugosa, called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Dark Red Meranti, is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Borneo, and occurs in Brunei, Kalimantan and Sarawak.
It is a Critically endangered species threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea rugosa". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33433A9784080. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33433A9784080.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
